title: Bounce Back
description:
David Arroyo, Diana Dinerman, and Mike Cotayo share stories about racial tension on the subway, car vandalism as revenge, and a sexual assault between gay men.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Capiozzo & Mecco, David Arroyo, Diana Dinerman, The Teskey Brothers, Mike Cotayo, The Paper Kites, Robert Fullum)
